title: SOLD: c1908 RPPC signed by Harry Howell - Highlanders / St. Louis Browns
author: rholmes

posts.post_title: SOLD: c1908 RPPC signed by Harry Howell - Highlanders / St. Louis Browns
posts.post_content:
FS: c1908 RPPC signed and annotated with career history by Harry Howell, pitcher credited with the first win in New York AL franchise history with the Highlanders in 1903. Howell is a rare autograph, and this one is a beauty on a Bell & Palfrey, St. Louis RPPC picturing Howell at spring training with the St. Louis Browns in 1908. I can't imagine there is a better signed Howell piece than this one. There is no autograph cert with the postcard but authenticity is absolutely guaranteed forever. 

RPPC size: 3.5" x 5.5"

Price: $SOLD shipped

PM or email with interest.

Email: semloh00 (at) yahoo.com

Thx,
Ray
